gate_open: ^You tug at the slippery gate handles, only for them to stay firmly shut.
^You dig your feet into the mud, slowly forcing the door open.
courtyard: ^(Yeesh... This place could use a facelift.)
bushes: ^(The bushes look like they could use some TLC.)
fountain: ^(I wonder who's paying the water bill.)
advance_to_door: ^(I can see the mansion up ahead.)
move_to_concierge: ^(Might as well get this over with.)
cancel_concierge: ^(I should take a moment to take this all in. It's not like I'm going to be at a mansion again anytime soon.)
sidetable: ^It's a rotting sidetable with a leather journal resting on top.
portrait: ^(Now I can put a name to the face.)
^A new note was added to your notebook.
display: ^A cloud of dust erupts as you swipe your hand across the display case.
^Inside you see a bronze statue of Lady Justice.
^A new note was added to your notebook.
display_know: ^A glass display showcasing a miniature of Lady Justice.
door: ^(I know I need to search the other rooms...)
snoop: ^You pick it up; the leather is smooth.
^The aged and yellow pages are covered with passages written in hurried cursive.
^A few sentences stick out to you.
^"...weak are those who do not repent..."
^A new note was added to your notebook.
no_snoop: ^(Creepy books don't usually lead to good things.)
armchair: ^The leather is peeling, and there's a dark and wet puddle in the middle of the chair.
lighting: ^The shades are covered in cobwebs and mold.
fireplace: ^The bricks are warm, but there's only charcoal inside.
